Title: Relates to the state board of parole membership, interviews with inmates, and determination of parole
Summary: Allows for the removal of members of the state board of parole by a majority vote in the senate and the assembly, requires three or more members of such board personally interview potential parolees, and requires that the determination to parole an inmate be unanimous.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to the state board of parole membership, interviews with inmates, and determination of parole
